29.long: I dwell in, settle in, am established in (permanently), inhabit.
Judea, a Roman province, capital Jerusalem.
a brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian.

30.long: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.

30.brief: I send forth, send, send away, dismiss
30.long: I send forth, send (as a messenger, commission, etc.), send away, dismiss.
elder, usually used as subst.; an elder, a member of the Sanhedrin, an elder of a Christian assembly.
(a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
Barnabas, a Cypriote Jew, uncle of John Mark; his other name was Joseph.
